channel.title: What is the benefits of having allies with a high friendship points?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "What is the benefits of having allies with a high friendship points?"

item.title: Re: What is the benefits of having allies with a high friendship points?
item.content:encoded: If you have high-but-not-enough-for-hangout-status friendship with someone and a Glowing Mood Ring, there's a good chance in the next week or so of getting a random +30 Stamina as the higher friendships get reset by hanging out.

item.title: Re: What is the benefits of having allies with a high friendship points?
item.content:encoded: Helps with learning Justu's as well. For example, if a Justsu costs 50000 to learn; hanging out with that ally halves the cost. So now it will be 25000, which means you can learn more jutsu's or whatnot.

item.title: Re: What is the benefits of having allies with a high friendship points?
item.content:encoded: they should make up something that makes friends with high friendship points more effective

item.title: Re: What is the benefits of having allies with a high friendship points?
item.content:encoded: For the most part, having high friend points (without hanging out) is useless.

item.title: Re: What is the benefits of having allies with a high friendship points?
item.content:encoded:
If you get a Glowing Mood Ring, hanging out with someone will give you 30 stamina. Otherwise, there's not anything else besides that. :P

And also, you don't need to be hanging out with them to tame their summon. If you get 300+ friend points with them, then you can get the mission, and if you're hanging with them, you can bypass the FP requirement.

item.title: What is the benefits of having allies with a high friendship points?
item.content:encoded: Expect being able to do their summoning mission, and a ranking on the friend rankings?
